Posts.Content: Jan 10, 2010 08:44PM Renee_K wrote: Would you be able to tell me how long it took for the pain to diminish / go away?  I'm finishing radiation this week.  My joint and bone pain began approx. 5 days after my last chemo treatment.  (Taxotere was on of the drugs I received.)   I only take Ibuprofen for the but after reading these posts, will definately increase my Vitamin D intake.  My Oncologist has suggested taking both Neurontin and Paxil for the pain but I would rather not be on these types of medications.  Thank you!!!  Renee K.
Posts.Title: Relief for Herceptin joint pain suzieq60 sheila888
